description.value:
A Very reliable detonator. Provides +20 to the "Place Explosives" Special use of the Demolition Skill. If the user would accidentally trigger an explosion when planting or disarming explosives using this device, they may spend a fate point to avert the detonation, shutting the detonator down instead.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
